verses.roman:
lajjita haila bhaṭṭa, haila apamāne
duḥkhita hañā gela paṇḍitera sthāne

synonyms: lajjita—ashamed; haila—became; bhaṭṭa—Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; haila apamāne—felt insulted; duḥkhita hañā—being unhappy; gela—went; paṇḍitera sthāne—to Gadādhara Paṇḍita.
translation: Ashamed, insulted and unhappy, Vallabha Bhaṭṭa went to Gadādhara Paṇḍita.
